items.sentence: Tom rolled up his sleeves before he started washing the dishes.
Tom said that he thought that Mary was good at speaking French.
Tom saw how exhausted Mary was and told her to go right to bed.
Tom has so much money that he doesn\'t know what to do with it.
We probably don\'t have enough time to finish doing this today.
The reason that Tom does that for Mary is because he loves her.
Tom didn\'t learn how to play the guitar until he was thirteen.
Tom says he doesn\'t know where Mary bought her pearl necklace.
Tom tried to talk to Mary, but she didn\'t want to talk to him.
Tom was afraid that they\'d lock him up and throw away the key.
